long_description: The Timbuk2 Deluxe Strap Pad is an upgraded strap pad with improved cushioning and a sticky bottom. Think of it as shoulder protection on 5 cups of espresso! Nylon attachment loops secure accessories where you want them. Constructed with durable ballistic nylon and infused with enough full body, delicious cushioning to invigorate any shoulder. Compatible with all Timbuk2 Messenger Bags.
short_description: The Timbuk2 Deluxe Strap Pad is an upgraded strap pad with improved cushioning and a sticky bottom. Think of it as shoulder protection on 5 cups of espresso!
